pageContext.claim: “With that being said, the King firmly denied any knowledge of it. He didn't really know. Maybe -- I don't want to get into his mind -- but it sounded to me like maybe these could have been rogue killers. Who knows?”
pageContext.analysis: Trump floated the idea of "rogue killers" in the disappearance of Washington Post columnist Jamal Khashoggi, despite considerable evidence the government was involved. The Saudi government later admitted the murder had been planned.
